short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick ASL dictionary lookup for signs and meanings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you part of the ASL community which continues to be under-represented in a fast-paced, evolving world increasingly relying on technology? Or are you simply hitting a learning barrier when trying to learn American Sign Language? Well, our Google Chrome extension ASLearner makes learning ASL more accessible than ever. Get instant translations of highlighted words, learn from integrated YouTube videos, and practice your signing with interactive toolsâ€”all without leaving your browser! This extension is perfect for anyone eager to learn ASL!
